name: Maddi Mini Dress - Grey
description: Exceptional look. Fits like a second skin on the model. The straps combined with the gauntlet sleeves make for a very fashionable look. A must have for any woman in the early 20's to mid 50's who likes cocktail dresses, pantsuits, and mini dresses. When I gave it to the model after the shoot she was so excited to take it home and wear it out for a night on the town with her husband.
